belts.progressiveLevels: Five progressive levels from foundational vulnerability to visionary leadership.
belts.white_description: Self-awareness, emotional intelligence, feedback receptivity, acknowledging weaknesses
belts.blue_description: Relational intelligence, active listening, empathy, trust-building, psychological safety
belts.purple_description: Healthy debate, decision-making, alignment, uncomfortable conversations, clarity
belts.brown_description: Peer accountability, collective results, standards, calling out performance gaps
belts.black_description: Strategic thinking, organizational impact, vision creation, culture transformation
belts.takeBeltAssessment: Take the Belt Assessment to discover your current level
belts.earnXPToUnlock: Earn {{xp}} XP to unlock this belt

assessments.title: Assessments
assessments.description: Discover insights about yourself and your team through research-backed assessments.
assessments.workerType_desc: Discover if you're a Sprinter, Jogger, or Ultra-marathoner
assessments.mentalWellness_desc: Check in with your mental and emotional wellbeing
assessments.communicationStyle_desc: Understand how you communicate with others
assessments.leadershipStyle_desc: Comprehensive analysis of your leadership approach
assessments.beltAssessment_desc: Determine your starting belt in the development system
assessments.valuesDiscovery_desc: Identify your core values and how they guide your decisions
assessments.decisionMaking_desc: Understand your approach to making decisions
assessments.teamDynamics_desc: Evaluate your team's health and collaboration
assessments.question: Question {{current}} of {{total}}
assessments.eachAssessmentEarns: Each assessment earns you 100 XP and helps track your development journey

openMat.title: Open Mat
openMat.description: Practical tools and exercises for everyday leadership development. Pick any tool and start practicing.
openMat.openMatDescription: In martial arts, "open mat" is free practice time. Here, it's the same concept: tools you can use anytime to develop your leadership skills. No progression requiredâ€”just pick what you need and practice.
openMat.boxBreathing_desc: Calm your nervous system with this simple 4-4-4-4 breathing technique
openMat.morningRoutine_desc: Start your day with intention and energy
openMat.energyAudit_desc: Map your energy throughout the day to optimize performance
openMat.weeklyReview_desc: Reflect on your week and plan for the next one
openMat.decisionFramework_desc: Make better decisions with structured thinking

breathing.title: Box Breathing
breathing.description: 4-4-4-4 breathing pattern to calm your nervous system
breathing.step1_desc: Breathe in slowly through your nose
breathing.step3_desc: Breathe out slowly through your mouth
breathing.step4_desc: Hold your breath before starting again
breathing.tipText: Practice for at least 3 cycles (about 1 minute) to experience the calming effects. This technique activates your parasympathetic nervous system, reducing stress and anxiety.

morningRoutine.title: 5-Minute Morning Routine
morningRoutine.description: Start your day with intention and energy
morningRoutine.goodStart: Great job starting your day with intention
morningRoutine.gratitude_desc: Think of 3 things you're grateful for today
morningRoutine.intention_desc: What's your main focus for today? Set a clear intention
morningRoutine.movement_desc: Simple stretches or light movement to wake up your body
morningRoutine.visualization_desc: See yourself successfully completing your day
